projects.title: Zafran Security

projects.title: NOF cooling
projects.description: Built a React Native app to monitor and control smart on-farm refrigeration units via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE).
bulletPoints: Developed a React Native mobile application for remote monitoring and control of on-farm refrigerators.
Built a Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) communication layer in React Native to query and control refrigeration units.
Designed the backend infrastructure using Supabase and edge functions

projects.title: Groundwork
projects.description: Built a CRM platform and an offline-first mobile app for farm management and soil sampling.
bulletPoints: Led development of an offline-first React Native sampling app: implemented a custom sync engine, integrated React Native Maps.
Developed the entire user onboarding flow in the CRM, streamlining farm registration and user management.
Built a mocking system to allow end-to-end testing without interacting with labs or physical samplers.

projects.title: PlaySTUIDOS
projects.description: Built an internal tool to measure and visualize ad performance across multiple campaigns.
bulletPoints: Implemented interactive data visualizations in React using Plotly.js
Authored SQL queries against DynamoDB via PartiQL to aggregate and filter large-scale ad campaign data.
Developed RESTful API endpoints in Python/Flask to serve dashboard data to front-end applications.
